lead_paragraph: Representing your country at the biggest sporting event in the world is a daunting prospect for any athlete, but for 13-year-old Olympian Gaurika Singh, it pales in comparison with surviving an earthquake in her native Nepal.

headline.print_headline: Youngest Olympian Keeps Pressure in Perspective
headline.main: Youngest Olympian Keeps Pressure in Perspective

snippet: Representing your country at the biggest sporting event in the world is a daunting prospect for any athlete, but for 13-year-old Olympian Gaurika Singh, it pales in comparison with surviving an earthquake in her native Nepal....
